SELECT A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ , A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD , A.EXAM_GRP_CD , A.EXAM_YEAR , A.EXAM_NO , A.CONTENT , A.ANSWER , A.CMNTR , A.QUIZ_NO , A.QUIZ_TRUE_RATIO , B.QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ , B.USER_ANSWER , B.ANSWER_CHK , B.USER_CHK_IMPRT , B.USER_CHK_CNFSD FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD ORDER BY A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ) AS QUIZ_NO , A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ, A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD, A.EXAM_GRP_CD, A.EXAM_YEAR, A.EXAM_NO, A.CONTENT, A.ANSWER, A.CMNTR , ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN B.ANSWER_CHK = 'O' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) * 100, 2) AS QUIZ_TRUE_RATIO FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO A, QUIZ_USER_ANS B WHERE A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = B.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ) A , (SELECT QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ, QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ, USER_ANSWER, ANSWER_CHK, USER_CHK_IMPRT, USER_CHK_CNFSD FROM QUIZ_USER_ANS WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{userId}) B WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ

SELECT A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD ,
FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO A , (SELECT * FROM QUIZ_USER_ANS WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{userId}) B WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD ORDER BY A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ
